thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Equitable Posts Qtrly Earnings Per Share $2.36

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Equitable Posts Qtrly Earnings Per Share $2.36
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Equitable Group Inc:
* EQUITABLE GROUP REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND 2017 EARNINGS, INCREASES DIVIDEND
* FULL YEAR ‍​NET INTEREST INCOME $308.4 MILLION VERSUS $279.4 MILLION
* QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.36 * SETS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF C$0.26 PER SHARE * DECLARED QTRLY DIVIDEND OF $0.26 PER SHARE, REPRESENTS 13% INCREASE OVER DIVIDENDS DECLARED IN FEB 2017​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$2.37 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
